name: Side Dumbbell Trunk Flexion
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your right side with your legs straight and feet stacked.
2. Hold a dumbbell against your left chest, with your palm facing inward.
3. Engage your core muscles by pulling your belly button towards your spine.
4. Slowly lift the dumbbell off the ground, keeping it pressed to your chest, while flexing your trunk and keeping your legs and hips stable.
5. Pause briefly at the top of the movement.
6. Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position, controlling the descent with your trunk muscles.
7. Repeat on the other side by switching the weight to your right hand and targeting the left side of your core.
short_summary: Side Dumbbell Trunk Flexion is a unilateral exercise that targets the obliques and core muscles, performed while lying on one side with a dumbbell press against the opposite chest.
